content: water bottle holders are such a practical item they are an easy way to provide free hands to a teacher at recess a parent carrying all the baby gear or an outdoor enthusiast on a hike they make a great project for yourself as well as a useful gift this pattern offers detailed instructions as well as photos for the more difficult steps please note that this is an printable pdf version of this pattern can be purchased in my ravelry store to view the free version on my blog go to https //www caabcrochet com/water-bottle-holder-pattern-trellis materials size 4 yarn 120 yards i used one skein of lily sugar n cream us i9/ 5 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors sizing when completed at this gauge the bottle carrier should fit a typical 16 9 fl oz water bottle loosely and a slightly larger bottle with a snug fit stitches & abbreviations used chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet skip skip yo yarn over technique crocheting in the back loop
